page.title: 10St Ives' Superstore
page.content: We went to the Rainbow Superstore and asked 20 people some questions. One of these questions was:Why do they shop here ? Most people shop at the Rainbow because it is conveniently situated and because the prices are competitive,also there is a range of food and household products. The Rainbow is extremely busy during the week as it gets 10,000 customers. Generally the cashiers are polite but some people complained that the service was too slow. Fridays are the busiest day of the week,mostly because Rainbow keeps its doors open until 9.00pm,and workers sometimes just get there in time to do their shopping before the Rainbow closes its doors.The other reasons are probably that people get paid on Fridays and also they shop for the weekend.
